human est forges ke ni Did kre him jam li est nothing
Per your Lord ni certainly summon them together diabl gather them around Infer humiliated
Tiam ni pik each grup plej ardent opponent de plej Gracious
Ni kon plen put those est ind de brul therein
Cxiu single 1 de vi seg gxi; this est irrevocable decision your Lord
Tiam ni rescue righteous las transgressors gxi humiliated
When our revelations recited them clearly those disbelieve dir al those kred Which de us est prosperous? Which de us est majority
Many generaci hav ni annihilated them; ili est powerful prosperous
Dir Those choose ir astray plej Gracious vol plumb them sur gxis ili seg ki promes them! - either retribution Hor. Ke est when ili trov out who really est mav off weaker en potenc
DI EG guidance DE those choose DIREKT. Por bon deeds eternally rekompenc your Lord bring far put returns
Vi not unu rejected our revelations tiam dir mi est don wealth infan
Li seg future Li pren such pledge el plej Gracious
Ja ni record ki li utters tiam commit him al ever-increasing retribution
Tiam ni hered cxio li posed li ven us all sol
Ili worship DI ali di (ili pens) est help them
Sur des contrary ili reject their idolatry est their enemies
